tasks.title: Buy groceries
tasks.description: Get fruits, vegetables, and snacks for the week.

tasks.title: Finish homework
tasks.description: Complete math and science assignments before the deadline.

tasks.title: Attend team meeting
tasks.description: Discuss project updates with the team at 3 PM.

tasks.title: Clean the house
tasks.description: Vacuum the living room, mop the kitchen, and tidy up the bathroom.

tasks.title: Read a book
tasks.description: Read at least 20 pages of the novel before bed.

tasks.title: Go for a run
tasks.description: Run 5 kilometers around the park in the morning.

tasks.title: Plan weekend trip
tasks.description: Find travel options and book accommodation for the weekend getaway.

tasks.title: Organize emails
tasks.description: Sort and delete unnecessary emails in the inbox.

tasks.title: Call mom
tasks.description: Catch up with mom and check how she's doing.

tasks.title: Fix car issues
tasks.description: Check the engine oil level and get the brakes checked.
